text: Adela del Carmen Graniel Campos (born 26 December 1954) is a Mexican politician from the Party of the Democratic Revolution. From 2000 to 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Tabasco. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Tabasco Category:Women members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Party of the Democratic Revolution politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians Category:21st-century Mexican women politicians
title: Adela Graniel Campos
